Name: UEE 6th Platoon Medal (Damaged)
Description: A medal given to members of the UEE Marines 6th Platoon for distinguished service. The esteemed 6th Platoon 'Phantoms' have received this honor on numerous occasions, including for operations during the Second Tevarin War, on the Vanduul front and for rescuing a UEE survey team taken hostage by the Outsiders on Leir III. The discoloration of the ribbon and broken, corroded metal have left this medal in damaged condition.
